HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Edebere, echebe ma zere site na Stellar Security
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Anyị na-eme ka nchekwa siri ike nke ozi gị. A na-encrypt data niile na ndị na-ahụ anya. Anyị amaghị adreesị IP gị, ihe ị na-ekekọrịta, ma ọ bụ onye ị na-ekekọrịta njikọ nzuzo ahụ - na nke kachasị mkpa, ọdịnaya ahụ.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: Ị bụ naanị onye maara njikọ nke ozi nzuzo ị mepụtara na onye ị na-ekekọrịta ya na ya. Mgbe ị na-eme ihe nzuzo, ị nwere ike ịtinye paswọọdụ tupu enwere ike imeghe ya. Ọzọkwa, enwere ike ịtọ oge ọkụ. Ma ihe ọ bụla, ozi nzuzo ga-ehichapụ mgbe ụbọchị 14 gachara.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Njikọ niile na ọdịnaya bụ hashed na ndị na-ahụ anya, nke pụtara na anyị amaghị njikọ ahụ na ọdịnaya ahụ. Njikọ ọ bụla nwere ID pụrụ iche nke ogologo nke 36 nke bụ ịchekwa na-arụ ọrụ iji nweta Ozi Nzuzo na ọdịnaya ya nke na-eji AES-256.
HOME.STEP_1_TITLE: Dee ozi gị ma ọ bụ mepụta paswọọdụ
HOME.SHARE_DESCRIPTION_PART_1: Dee ma zipu ozi, a ga-eme ya
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: Edebere, echebe ma zere site na Stellar Security
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Dee ozi Nzuzo gị, paswọọdụ ma ọ bụ ozi dị mkpa *
HOME.SHARE_EMPTY: Hapụ efu maka nke ọ bụla.
HOME.CREATED_SUBTITLE: A ga-egosi ya naanị otu oge
HOME.CREATED_TITLE_SHARE: Detuo njikọ ma ọ bụ kekọrịta ya.

HOWITWORK.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Edebere, echebe ma zere site na Stellar Security
HOWITWORK.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY_DESCRIPTION: Nzuzo Stellar na-enye gị ohere ịkekọrịta njikọ nwere ike ịhụ otu oge yana ọdịnaya nwere mmetụta na njikọ nzuzo, nke naanị gị maara, yana onye nnata maara. Ụzọ ya kacha mma, idobe ozi dị nro na ngwa ozi-ngwa ọ bụla.
HOWITWORK.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Anyị na-eme ka nchekwa siri ike nke ozi gị. A na-encrypt data niile na ndị na-ahụ anya. Anyị amaghị adreesị IP gị, ihe ị na-ekekọrịta, ma ọ bụ onye ị na-ekekọrịta njikọ nzuzo ahụ - na nke kachasị mkpa, ọdịnaya ahụ.

HOWITWORK.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Njikọ niile na ọdịnaya bụ hashed na ndị na-ahụ anya, nke pụtara na anyị amaghị njikọ ahụ na ọdịnaya ahụ. Njikọ ọ bụla nwere ID pụrụ iche nke ogologo nke 36 nke bụ ịchekwa na-arụ ọrụ iji nweta Ozi Nzuzo na ọdịnaya ya nke na-eji AES-256.
